scripts.watch: ./node_modules/nodemon/bin/nodemon.js --verbose --watch app --ignore 'node_modules/*' --ignore '.git/*' --exec 'npm run kill && npm run runner' || true
scripts.watch-test: ./node_modules/nodemon/bin/nodemon.js --verbose --watch app --ignore 'node_modules/*' --ignore '.git/*' --exec 'npm run kill-test && npm run test2' || true
scripts.runner: docker  --tlsverify=false exec $(docker-compose ps -q web) node /src/app/ || true
scripts.test2: docker --tlsverify=false exec $(docker-compose ps -q web) /src/app/node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha -c --compilers js:babel-register --bail -r /src/app/test/index.js /src/app/test/*.spec.js || true
scripts.kill: docker  --tlsverify=false exec $(docker-compose ps -q web) pkill -f 'node /src/app/' || true
scripts.kill-test: docker  --tlsverify=false exec $(docker-compose ps -q web) pkill -f '/src/app/node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha' || true
scripts.install: docker  --tlsverify=false exec -it $(docker-compose ps -q web) npm install --prefix /src/app/
scripts.install-package: docker  --tlsverify=false exec -it $(docker-compose ps -q web) npm install --prefix /src/app/ --save
